title: Before Obama's Farewell, Looking Back at his Speeches with E.J. Dionne & Joy-Ann Reid
description: Joy-Ann Reid and E.J. Dionne, co-editors of "We Are the Change We Seek: The Speeches of Barack Obama" sat down with Chuck Todd to talk about the impact of Barack Obama's speeches. With a week to go before Obama's farewell address, they look back on Obama's speeches on race, his eulogies, and what to expect from Donald Trump's speeches.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
